Package src.model.game

Class QuartoWin

java.lang.Object
src.model.game.QuartoWin
public class QuartoWin extends Object
The QuartoWin class represents the winning conditions and lines in a game of Quarto. It provides methods for checking winning situations and retrieving win lines.

  • Method Details

    • getWinLine

      public List<int[]> getWinLine()
      Retrieves the list of the winning line.
      Returns:
      The list of the winning line.

    • winSituationLine

      public boolean winSituationLine​(QuartoPawn[][] table, int line)
      Checks if a winning situation occurs in a specific line.
      Parameters:
      table - The game board represented as a 2D array of QuartoPawn objects.
      line - The index of the line to check.
      Returns:
      True if a winning situation occurs in the line, false otherwise.

    • winSituationColumn

      public boolean winSituationColumn​(QuartoPawn[][] table, int column)
      Checks if a winning situation occurs in a specific column.
      Parameters:
      table - The game board represented as a 2D array of QuartoPawn objects.
      column - The index of the column to check.
      Returns:
      True if a winning situation occurs in the column, false otherwise.

    • winSituationDiagonal

      public boolean winSituationDiagonal​(QuartoPawn[][] table, int line, int column)
      Checks if a winning situation occurs in any of the diagonals.
      Parameters:
      table - The game board represented as a 2D array of QuartoPawn objects.
      line - The index of the line of the recently placed pawn.
      column - The index of the column of the recently placed pawn.
      Returns:
      True if a winning situation occurs in any of the diagonals, false otherwise.

    • clearWinLine

      public void clearWinLine()
      Clears the list of winning lines.
